Ben Bernanke , the former Federal Reserve chairman , said Thursday that the Trump administration 's tax cuts [V: would] initially boost the economy but reach the edge of the cliff in 2020 . Like Wile E. Coyote , they 're going to fall off , Bernake said , and make the Fed 's job harder .
